posts.cooked:
We team 12016 urgently need a part 3d printed.

Is there any team that brought a 3d printer and would be able to help us? Or any local team that could 3d print it for us for tomorrow
Post up the STL and the material and print specifications needed. Much easier for someone to offer help with all details posted in one place.

posts.name: Drew B.
posts.cooked: While I‚Äôm sure you can find a team to help, the Stratasys booth in the Robot Service Center offers prints as well.

posts.name: Steven Carmain
posts.cooked: We have a printer that should be free at 2pm if you can get over to FTC 10136.

Google Drive file.

Pla 4 walls 15% infill Preferably black

link_counts.title: Linear rod - intake connection.STL - Google Drive

posts.cooked: That would be amazing thank you

posts.name: ehochstein
posts.cooked: Formlabs is here this year too! Lots of 3D printing options to get your part(s) made.
